title: ONEOK Inc. Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics

content.text: As of a recent date, the market capitalization of ONEOK Inc was $30.46 billion.
To examine the valuation metrics, we will consider the following ratios:
The P/E ratio of ONEOK Inc is 17.43, which indicates that investors are willing to pay $17.43 for every dollar of ONEOK Inc's earnings.
The P/S ratio of ONEOK Inc is 1.09, implying that investors are valuing the company at $1.09 for every dollar of its sales.
The P/B ratio of ONEOK Inc is 2.81, suggesting that investors are willing to pay $2.81 for every dollar of ONEOK Inc's book value.
The P/CF ratio of ONEOK Inc is 11.95, indicating that investors are valuing the company at $11.95 for every dollar of its cash flow.
To compare ONEOK Inc's valuation metrics with industry benchmarks, similar companies in the industry can be considered.

ONEOK Inc has a market capitalization of $30.46 billion with P/E, P/S, P/B, and P/CF ratios of 17.43, 1.09, 2.81, and 11.95 respectively. Further analysis is needed to determine how these metrics compare to industry benchmarks.

news.headline: Oneok Checks All The Boxes For Income Investors
news.summary: Pipeline companies are a strong choice for investors searching for yield.  Oneok is in IBD's Dividend Leaders screen.  Headquartered in Tulsa, Okla., Oneok manages over 50,000 miles of pipeline networks for natural gas and crude products and owns storage and processing facilities.
